product_name: The North Face Dolomite 3S Sleeping Bag - Double
long_description: Pack for two! The North Face Dolomite Double 3S synthetic sleeping bag provides lightweight performance for a road trip or a weekend of summer camping. Heatseeker(TM) insulation offers a great warmth-to-weight ratio, is highly compressible and is extremely durable, making it ideal for cold weather. Shell is constructed of soft, ripstop nylon; polyester taffeta lining is soft next to skin. The North Face Dolomite 3S double sleeping bag includes a roll-top stuff sack.
short_description: Pack for two! The North Face Dolomite Double 3S synthetic sleeping bag provides lightweight performance for a road trip or a weekend of summer camping.
